articles.title: Amgen Strikes Drug Pricing Deal With Trump: What Investors Should Know
articles.mainIdea: Amgen Strikes Drug Pricing Deal With Trump: What Investors Should Know
articles.summary: Zacks: Amgen Strikes Drug Pricing Deal With Trump: What Investors Should Know. AMGN signs a pricing deal with the Trump administration, cutting U.S. drug costs, expanding DTC access and securing tariff relief tied to domestic investment. Related tickers mentioned: AMGN, BMY, GLAXF, GSK.
